name: NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceAttributeKey
desc: The following constants are keys for the dictionary returned by attributes(forVoice:).

items.name: static let identifier: NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceAttributeKey
items.desc: A unique string identifying the voice. The identifiers of the system voices are listed in Listing 1.

items.name: static let name: NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceAttributeKey
items.desc: The name of the voice suitable for display. An NSString.

items.name: static let age: NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceAttributeKey
items.desc: The perceived age (in years) of the voice. An NSString

items.name: static let gender: NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceAttributeKey
items.desc: The perceived gender of the voice. The supported values are listed in Voice Gender Keys. An NSString

items.name: static let demoText: NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceAttributeKey
items.desc: A demonstration string to speak. An NSString

items.name: static let localeIdentifier: NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceAttributeKey
items.desc: The language of the voice. An NSString

items.name: static let supportedCharacters: NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceAttributeKey
items.desc: A list of Unicode character id ranges that define the Unicode characters supported by this voice.

items.name: static let individuallySpokenCharacters: NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceAttributeKey
items.desc: A list of Unicode character id ranges that define the Unicode characters that can be spoken in character-by-character mode by this voice.
